评论详情: Great fit
These pants are alittle long for my legs, but with the elastic at the ankles it is okay. Very comfy pants for around the house or even to bed.

I originally brought these for the summertime to wear around the house then I started wearing them out because they were so pretty and I like them. I get a lot of compliments from them. In fact I bought another pair for my girlfriend because every time she sees me on with them on, she goes oh, I love those pants. The fabric is great. They wash up great they’re very comfortable. I highly recommend this brand. I’m not real crazy about the Boho pants that have that wide band of elastic at the top that scrunchie looking elastic. This does not have that and I like them.

I wear these as pajamas. They are soft and "silky" so they move with me when I roll over in bed instead of getting twisted. I like the pockets for my phone, etc when I wear them around the house. The elastic waist keeps them in place, but easy to take on and off. I find the fabric thickness just right for my use. They may be a little thin if I wore them out of the house.  I both like and dislike the elastic on the bottom of the legs. They can hike up, then they stay up and I have to push them down. But yet, if I want them up, they stay. These are a bit short on me. I'm just shy of 5'9", but I'm more leg than torso. More length would be nice so they covered my ankles.
I like the way they fit not too baggy has structure but still loose feeling

I work from home and have multiple different patterns of these pants, and they are so comfortable and lightweight. Easy to move around in. They don't fade in the wash. They can be worn indoors or out, and I run errands in them with no problem.
The pants are wearable but the material is thin. The pockets are in a weird spot.

The waist tie ends have metal caps. I've washed it a few times, and the material has held up well without pilling or being damaged.
